powerquery.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run build:packages && npm run webpack-prod
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:language-services && npm run build:format && npm run build:library
scripts.build:language-services: cd packages && cd powerquery-language-services && npm run build
scripts.build:format: cd packages && cd powerquery-format && npm run build
scripts.build:library: cd packages && cd powerquery-library && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.webpack-prod: npm run server:webpack-prod && npm run client:webpack-prod
scripts.test:packages: npm run test:language-services && npm run test:format && npm run test:library
scripts.test:language-services: cd packages && cd powerquery-language-services && npm test
scripts.test:format: cd packages && cd powerquery-format && npm test
scripts.test:library: cd packages && cd powerquery-library && npm test
